article.title: September 2017 Galaxy News
article.content:
[](/src/galaxy-updates/2017-09/index.md>)

The September 2017 Galaxy News is out and there are new publications (122 of them), events, open positions in France and the US, ToolShed contributions, and new releases of nebulizer and CloudBridge. August also saw the initial release of Takeru Galaxy, a fully configured (hardware and software) Galaxy server; and Galaskio, an easy to use GUI for running Galaxy workflows.

See the full newsletter
